name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use MSHTA
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use MSHTA in Scripts
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*set* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\&&* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*mshta* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*vbscript\:createobject* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*.run* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\(window.close\)*)`
